Love Island star Tommy Fury left fans and his girlfriend Molly-Mae Hague drooling after posting a photo of himself in a suit.

The 20-year-old looked dapper in the throwback picture, taken at the end of September at the Animal Hero Awards in London, which he posted to his Instagram page.

The handsome boxer rocked a navy blue tuxedo and crisp white dress shirt, complete with a bowtie, for the glamorous event held at the Grosvenor House hotel in London’s Mayfair.

He captioned the post simply with “TNT” and a bomb emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

Within minutes, girlfriend Molly-Mae added three ‘hearts in eyes’ emojis as she joined fans to fawn over her handsome partner.

Earlier in the week, Tommy posted a picture of himself from the same event alongside Molly-Mae, who looked stunning in a knockout floor length black gown.

The sophisticated one-shoulder dress clung to Molly-Mae’s curves, accentuating her stunning figure.

(Image: Instagram)

Tommy captioned the post with just the word “Wifey” sending fans into meltdown over the supposed ‘hidden message’.

The couple’s romance is still going strong since they left the Love Island villa, and recently spent a day in the gym together.

The pair teamed up for a couples sweat session which they shared with their Instagram followers.

Molly-Mae looks to be keen to learn a thing or two from her sportsman beau as she donned a pair of boxing gloves for the gym trip.

She was seen giving the boxing bag a good hammering and before running around the gym floor.

Mocking her skills, Tommy joked "gym time with this idiot" alongside a crying with laughter emoji and heart icon.
